mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberId, m1.loginId, password, snsProvider, snsId, name, email, userLevel, createdAt, updateAt, lastLogin, enabled, failureCnt, m2.profilePhoto, m2.receive_email FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId WHERE m1.loginId = #{loginId} AND m1.password = #{password} AND m1.enabled != 0

SELECT m1.memberId, m1.loginId, password, snsProvider, snsId, name, email, userLevel, createdAt, lastLogin, enabled FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId WHERE sns_provider = #{sns_provider, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sns_id = #{sns_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
